GIS & Geospatial Systems

GIS (Geographic Information Systems) allows mapping, spatial analysis, and geostatistical modeling.

ğŸ—ºï¸ GIS Capabilities

  • Map creation & visualization
  • Raster & vector analysis
  • Spatial interpolation
  • Geostatistics (Kriging)
  • Spatial databases
  • Web GIS (Leaflet, Mapbox)

ğŸ”§ Open-Source GIS Tools

QGIS

Leading open-source GIS software.
ğŸ”— https://qgis.org

ğŸ”— https://gdal.org

PostGIS

Spatial extension for PostgreSQL.
ğŸ”— https://postgis.net

Geospatial modeling & analysis.
ğŸ”— https://grass.osgeo.org

GeoPandas

Pythonic geospatial library.
ğŸ”— https://geopandas.org
